talentList.name: Starlight Wrath
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of your Wrath and Starfire spells by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Moonfire
talentList.description: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Nature's Reach
talentList.description: Increases the range of your Balance spells and Faerie Fire (Feral) ability by v0%, and reduces the threat generated by your Balance spells by v1%.

talentList.name: Brambles
talentList.description: Damage from your Thorns and Entangling Roots increased by v0% and damage done by your Treants increased by v1%. In addition, damage from your Treants and attacks done to you while you have Barkskin active have a v2% chance to daze the target for 3 sec.

talentList.name: Moonglow
talentList.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Starfall, Wrath, Healing Touch, Nourish, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Celestial Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Starfire, Hibernate and Hurricane by v0% and increases your total spell haste by v1%.

talentList.name: Insect Swarm
talentList.description: The enemy target is swarmed by insects, decreasing their chance to hit by 3% and causing 144 Nature damage over 12 sec.

talentList.name: Nature's Grace
talentList.description: All non-periodic spell criticals have a v0% chance to grace you with a blessing of nature, increasing your spell casting speed by 20% for 3 sec.

talentList.name: Moonfury
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Vengeance
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Starfall, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Moonkin Form
talentList.description:
Shapeshift into Moonkin Form.  While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by 370%, damage taken while stunned is reduced by 15%, and all party and raid members within 100 yards have their spell critical chance increased by 5%.  Single target spell critical strikes in this form have a chance to instantly regenerate 2% of your total mana.  The Moonkin can not cast healing or resurrection spells while shapeshifted.

The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

talentList.name: Lunar Guidance
talentList.description: Increases your spell power by v0% of your total Intellect.

talentList.name: Balance of Power
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with all spells by v0% and reduces your damage taken from all spells by v1%.

talentList.name: Dreamstate
talentList.description: Regenerate mana equal to v0% of your Intellect every 5 sec, even while casting.

talentList.name: Improved Faerie Fire
talentList.description: Your Faerie Fire spell also increases the chance the target will be hit by spell attacks by v0%, and increases the critical strike chance of your damage spells by v1% on targets afflicted by Faerie Fire.

talentList.name: Wrath of Cenarius
talentList.description: Your Starfire spell gains an additional v0% and your Wrath gains an additional v1% of your bonus damage effects.

talentList.name: Force of Nature
talentList.description: Summons 3 treants to attack enemy targets for 30 sec.

talentList.name: Nature's Majesty
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Wrath, Starfire, Starfall, Nourish and Healing Touch spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Moonkin Form
talentList.description: Your Moonkin Aura also causes affected targets to gain v0% haste and you to gain v1% of your spirit as additional spell damage.

talentList.name: Owlkin Frenzy
talentList.description: Attacks done to you while in Moonkin form have a v0% chance to cause you to go into a Frenzy, increasing your damage by 10%, cause you to be immune to pushback while casting Balance spells and restore 2% base mana every 2 sec. Lasts 10 sec.

talentList.name: Typhoon
talentList.description: You summon a violent Typhoon that does 400 Nature damage when in contact with hostile targets, knocking them back and dazing them for 6 sec.

talentList.name: Eclipse
talentList.description: When you critically hit with Starfire, you have a v0% chance of increasing damage done by Wrath by 40%. When you critically hit with Wrath, you have a v1% chance of increasing your critical strike chance with Starfire by 40%. Each effect lasts 15 sec and each has a separate 30 sec cooldown.  Both effects cannot occur simultaneously.

talentList.name: Gale Winds
talentList.description: Increases damage done by your Hurricane and Typhoon spells by v0%, and increases the range of your Cyclone spell by v1 yards.

talentList.name: Starfall
talentList.description: You summon a flurry of stars from the sky on all targets within 30 yards of the caster, each dealing 145 to 167 Arcane damage. Also causes 26 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards of the enemy target. Maximum 20 stars. Lasts 10 sec.  Shapeshifting into an animal form or mounting cancels the effect. Any effect which causes you to lose control of your character will suppress the starfall effect.

talentList.name: Earth and Moon
talentList.description: Your Wrath and Starfire spells have a 100% chance to apply the Earth and Moon effect, which increases spell damage taken by v0% for 1v1 sec.  Also increases your spell damage by 2%.

talentList.name: Genesis
talentList.description: Increases the damage and healing done by your periodic spell damage and healing effects by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Insect Swarm
talentList.description: Increases your damage done by your Wrath spell to targets afflicted by your Insect Swarm by v0%, and increases the critical strike chance of your Starfire spell by v1% on targets afflicted by your Moonfire spell.

talentList.name: Nature's Splendor
talentList.description: Increases the duration of your Moonfire and Rejuvenation spells by 3 sec, your Regrowth spell by 6 sec, and your Insect Swarm and Lifebloom spells by 2 sec.

talentList.name: Thick Hide
talentList.description: Increases your Armor contribution from cloth and leather items by v0%.

talentList.name: Feral Aggression
talentList.description: Increases the attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by v0% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by v1%.

talentList.name: Ferocity
talentList.description: Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, Rake and Mangle abilities by v0 Rage or Energy.

talentList.name: Brutal Impact
talentList.description: Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by v0 sec and decreases the cooldown of Bash by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Sharpened Claws
talentList.description: Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by v0%.

talentList.name: Feral Instinct
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Swipe ability by v0% and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling.

talentList.name: Primal Fury
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form and your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points  have a v1% chance to add an additional combo point.

talentList.name: Shredding Attacks
talentList.description: Reduces the energy cost of your Shred ability by v0 and the rage cost of your Lacerate ability by v1.

talentList.name: Predatory Strikes
talentList.description: Increases your melee attack power in Cat, Bear and Dire Bear Forms by v0% of your level and v1% of any attack power on your equipped weapon.  In addition, your finishing moves have a v2% chance per combo point to make your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. become an instant cast spell.

talentList.name: Feral Charge
talentList.description:
Teaches Feral Charge (Bear) and Feral Charge (Cat).

Feral Charge (Bear) - Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 sec. This ability can be used in Bear Form and Dire Bear Form. 15 second cooldown.

Feral Charge (Cat) - Causes you to leap behind an enemy, dazing them for 3 sec. 30 second cooldown.

talentList.name: Savage Fury
talentList.description: Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Mangle (Cat), Mangle (Bear), and Maul abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Feral Swiftness
talentList.description: Increases your movement speed by v0% in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge while in Cat Form, Bear Form and Dire Bear Form by v1%.

talentList.name: Heart of the Wild
talentList.description: Increases your Intellect by v0%.  In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by v1% and while in Cat Form your attack power is increased by v2%.

talentList.name: Leader of the Pack
talentList.description: While in Cat, Bear or Dire Bear Form, the Leader of the Pack increases ranged and melee critical chance of all party and raid members within 100 yards by 5%.

talentList.name: Survival Instincts
talentList.description: When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum health for 20 sec while in Bear Form, Cat Form, or Dire Bear Form.  After the effect expires, the health is lost.

talentList.name: Nurturing Instinct
talentList.description: Increases your healing spells by up to v0% of your Agility, and increases healing done to you by v1% while in Cat form.

talentList.name: Primal Tenacity
talentList.description: Reduces the duration of fear effects by v0%, reduces all damage taken while stunned by v1% while in Cat Form.

talentList.name: Survival of the Fittest
talentList.description: Increases all attributes by v0%, reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by v1%, and increases your armor contribution from cloth and leather items in Bear Form and Dire Bear Form by v2%.

talentList.name: Predatory Instincts
talentList.description: While in Cat Form increases your damage from melee critical strikes by v0% and reduces the damage taken from area of effect attacks by v1%.

talentList.name: Mangle
talentList.description: Mangle the target, inflicting damage and causing the target to take additional damage from bleed effects for 1 min.  This ability can be used in Cat Form or Dire Bear Form.

talentList.name: Improved Leader of the Pack
talentList.description: Your Leader of the Pack ability also causes affected targets to heal themselves for v0% of their total health when they critically hit with a melee or ranged attack.  The healing effect cannot occur more than once every 6 sec.  In addition, you gain v1% of your maximum mana when you benefit from this heal.

talentList.name: Primal Precision
talentList.description: Increases your expertise by v0, and you are refunded v1% of the energy cost of a finishing move if it fails to land.

talentList.name: Rend and Tear
talentList.description: Increases damage done by your Maul and Shred attacks on bleeding targets by v0%, and increases the critical strike chance of your Ferocious Bite ability on bleeding targets by v1%.

talentList.name: Infected Wounds
talentList.description: Your Shred, Maul, and Mangle attacks cause an Infected Wound in the target. The Infected Wound reduces the movement speed of the target by v0% and the attack speed by v1%. Lasts 12 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Mangle
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Mangle (Bear) ability by v0 sec., and reduces the energy cost of your Mangle (Cat) ability by v1.

talentList.name: King of the Jungle
talentList.description: While using your Enrage ability in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form, your damage is increased by v0%, and your Tiger's Fury ability also instantly restores v1 energy.  In addition, the mana cost of Bear Form, Cat Form, and Dire Bear Form is reduced by v2%.

talentList.name: Berserk
talentList.description:
When activated, this ability causes your Mangle (Bear) ability to hit up to 3 targets and have no cooldown, and reduces the energy cost of all your Cat Form abilities by 50%.  Lasts 15 sec.  You cannot use Tiger's Fury while Berserk is active. 

Clears the effect of Fear and makes you immune to Fear for the duration.

talentList.name: Protector of the Pack
talentList.description: Increases your attack power by v0% and reduces the damage you take by v1%, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form.

talentList.name: Natural Reaction
talentList.description: Increases your dodge while in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form by v0%, and you regenerate v1 rage every time you dodge while in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form.

talentList.name: Primal Gore
talentList.description: Grants the periodic damage from your Lacerate and Rip abilities the ability to critically hit.

talentList.name: Improved Mark of the Wild
talentList.description: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by v0%, and increases all of your total attributes by v1%.

talentList.name: Furor
talentList.description: Gives you v0% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form, and you keep up to v1 of your Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form, and increases your total Intellect while in Moonkin form by v2%.

talentList.name: Nature's Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks  while casting Healing Touch, Wrath, Entangling Roots, Cyclone, Nourish, Regrowth and Tranquility by v0%.

talentList.name: Naturalist
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by v0 sec and increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by v1%.

talentList.name: Nature's Bounty
talentList.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth and Nourish spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Natural Shapeshifter
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by v0%.

talentList.name: Omen of Clarity
talentList.description: Each of the Druid's damage, healing spells and auto attacks has a chance of causing the caster to enter a Clearcasting state.  The Clearcasting state reduces the Mana, Rage or Energy cost of your next damage, healing spell or offensive ability by 100%.

talentList.name: Gift of Nature
talentList.description: Increases the effect of all healing spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Intensity
talentList.description: Allows v0% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting and causes your Enrage ability to instantly generate v1 rage.

talentList.name: Improved Rejuvenation
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Nature's Swiftness
talentList.description: When activated, your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

talentList.name: Subtlety
talentList.description: Reduces the threat generated by your restoration spells by v0% and reduces the chance your helpful spells, Moonfire, and Insect Swarm will be dispelled by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Tranquility
talentList.description: Reduces threat caused by Tranquility by v0%, and reduces the cooldown by v1%.

talentList.name: Tranquil Spirit
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch, Nourish and Tranquility spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Swiftmend
talentList.description: Consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation or 18 sec. of Regrowth.

talentList.name: Empowered Touch
talentList.description: Your Healing Touch spell gains an additional v0% and your Nourish spell gains an additional v1% of your bonus healing effects.

talentList.name: Empowered Rejuvenation
talentList.description: The bonus healing effects of your healing over time spells is increased by v0%.

talentList.name: Natural Perfection
talentList.description: Your critical strike chance with all spells is increased by v0% and critical strikes against you give you the Natural Perfection effect reducing all damage taken by v1%.  Stacks up to 3 times.  Lasts 8 sec.

talentList.name: Tree of Life
talentList.description:
Reduces the mana cost of your healing over time spells by 20% and grants the ability to shapeshift into the Tree of Life. While in this form you increase healing received by 6% for all party and raid members within 100 yards, and you can only cast Restoration spells in addition to Innervate, Barkskin, Nature's Grasp and Thorns spells.

The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

talentList.name: Living Spirit
talentList.description: Increases your total Spirit by v0%.

talentList.name: Master Shapeshifter
talentList.description:
Grants an effect which lasts while the Druid is within the respective shapeshift form.

Bear Form - Increases physical damage by v0%.

Cat Form - Increases critical strike chance by v1%.

Moonkin Form - Increases spell damage by vv3%.

Tree of Life Form - Increases healing by 2%.

talentList.name: Gift of the Earthmother
talentList.description: Increases your total spell haste by v0% and reduces the base cooldown of your Lifebloom spell by v1%.

talentList.name: Wild Growth
talentList.description: Heals up to 5 friendly party or raid members within 15 yards of the target for 686 over 7 sec. The amount healed is applied quickly at first, and slows down as the Wild Growth reaches its full duration.

talentList.name: Living Seed
talentList.description: When you critically heal your target with Swiftmend, Regrowth, Nourish or Healing Touch spell you have a v0% chance to plant a Living Seed on the target for 30% of the amount healed. The Living Seed will bloom when the target is next attacked. Lasts 15 sec.

talentList.name: Revitalize
talentList.description: Your Rejuvenation and Wild Growth spells have a v0% chance to restore 8 Energy, 4 Rage, 1% Mana or 16 Runic Power per tick.

talentList.name: Improved Tree of Life
talentList.description: Increases your armor contribution from items while in Tree of Life Form by v0%, and increases your healing spell power by v1% of your spirit while in Tree of Life Form.

talentList.name: Improved Barkskin
talentList.description: Grants v0% additional armor contribution from cloth and leather items while in Travel Form or while not shapeshifted, increases the damage reduction granted by your Barkskin spell by v1% and reduces the chance your Barkskin is dispelled by v2%.

major.name: Glyph of Nourish
major.description: Your Nourish heals an additional 6% for each of your heal over time effects present on the target.

major.name: Glyph of Savage Roar
major.description: Your Savage Roar ability grants an additional 3% bonus damage done.

major.name: Glyph of Focus
major.description: Increases the damage done by Starfall by 10%, but decreases its radius by 50%.

major.name: Glyph of Lifebloom
major.description: Increases the duration of Lifebloom by 1 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Starfall
major.description: Reduces the cooldown of Starfall by 30 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Wild Growth
major.description: Wild Growth can affect 1 additional target.

major.name: Glyph of Berserk
major.description: Increases the duration of Berserk by 5 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Mangle
major.description: Increases the damage done by Mangle by 10%.

major.name: Glyph of Monsoon
major.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Typhoon spell by 3 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Barkskin
major.description: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by 25% while Barkskin is active.

major.name: Glyph of Swiftmend
major.description: Your Swiftmend ability no longer consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect from the target.

major.name: Glyph of Innervate
major.description: Innervate now grants the caster 45% of his base mana pool over 10 sec in addition to the normal effects of Innervate.

major.name: Glyph of Hurricane
major.description: Your Hurricane ability now also slows the movement speed of its victims by 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Frenzied Regeneration
major.description: While Frenzied Regeneration is active, healing effects on you are 20% more powerful.

major.name: Glyph of Rake
major.description: Your Rake ability prevents targets from fleeing.

major.name: Glyph of Shred
major.description: Each time you Shred, the duration of your Rip on the target is extended 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Rip
major.description: Increases the duration of your Rip ability by 4 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Insect Swarm
major.description: Increases the damage of your Insect Swarm ability by 30%, but it no longer affects your victim's chance to hit.

major.name: Glyph of Rebirth
major.description: Players resurrected by Rebirth are returned to life with 100% health.

major.name: Glyph of Claw
major.description: Reduces the energy cost of your Claw ability by 5.

major.name: Glyph of Survival Instincts
major.description: Your Survival Instincts ability grants an additional 15% of your maximum health.

major.name: Glyph of Regrowth
major.description: Increases the healing of your Regrowth spell by 20% if your Regrowth effect is still active on the target.

major.name: Glyph of Moonfire
major.description: Increases the periodic damage of your Moonfire ability by 75%, but initial damage is decreased by 90%.

major.name: Glyph of Growl
major.description: Increases the chance for your Growl ability to work successfully by 8%.

major.name: Glyph of Maul
major.description: Your Maul ability now hits 1 additional target.

major.name: Glyph of Healing Touch
major.description: Decreases the cast time of Healing Touch by 1.5 sec, the mana cost by 25%, and the amount healed by 50%.

major.name: Glyph of Entangling Roots
major.description: Increases the damage your Entangling Roots victims can take before the Entangling Roots automatically breaks by 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Rejuvenation
major.description: While your Rejuvenation targets are below 50% health, you will heal them for an additional 50% health.

major.name: Glyph of Rapid Rejuvenation
major.description: Your haste now reduces the time between the periodic healing ticks of your Rejuvenation spell.

major.name: Glyph of Wrath
major.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting your Wrath spell by 50%.

minor.name: Glyph of Typhoon
minor.description: Reduces the cost of your Typhoon spell by 8% and increases its radius by 10 yards, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

minor.name: Glyph of Challenging Roar
minor.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Challenging Roar ability by 30 sec.

minor.name: Glyph of Unburdened Rebirth
minor.description: Your Rebirth spell no longer requires a reagent.

minor.name: Glyph of Dash
minor.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Dash ability by 20%.

minor.name: Glyph of Aquatic Form
minor.description: Increases your swim speed by 50% while in Aquatic Form.

minor.name: Glyph of Thorns
minor.description: Increases the duration of your Thorns ability by 50 min when cast on yourself.

minor.name: Glyph of the Wild
minor.description: Mana cost of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells reduced by 50%.
